messages.update: Some new mod integration! Change log on the ATLauncher site as normal.

mod.name: Damage Indicators
mod.description: Shows how much damage any mob has

mod.description: Attachments to pigs to get there meat

mod.description: New bees and trees for Forestry

mod.name: Biomes O Plenty
mod.description: Many new Biomes

mod.name: Block Extenders
mod.description: Blocks only have six sides, but in current modded Minecraft you almost always need multiple inputs and outputs. Sadly, the only really hidden side is the bottom. Wouldn't it be great if you could connect more inputs/outputs to one side?

mod.name: Buildcraft
mod.description: Buildcraft adds a bunch of items like Quarries as well as adding in pipes for transporting liquids around

mod.name: Additional Buildcraft Objects
mod.description: New pipes for buildcraft with extra functions

mod.name: Carpenters Blocks
mod.description: This mod adds slopes and a custom variety of vanilla-inspired blocks to the game!

mod.name: Charging Pads
mod.description: Pads you can charge your IC2 armor on while standing still

mod.name: Chisel
mod.description: New Pretty Blocks

mod.name: Armor Status HUD
mod.description: Shows your armor damage

mod.name: Compact Solars
mod.description: Compact solar panels for IC2

mod.name: Custom Codex
mod.description: Little something added by darkhax!

mod.name: Custom Branding
mod.description: Little something added by darkhax!

mod.name: Custom Server
mod.description: Adds our server to your server list

mod.name: Compact Wind Mills
mod.description: Compact wind mills for IC2

mod.name: ComputerCraft
mod.description: Programmable Computers in minecraft

mod.name: DenPipes
mod.description: New pipes for Buildcraft

mod.name: DenPipes Emerald
mod.description: Extra pipes for buildcraft

mod.name: DenPipes Forestry
mod.description: Extra functions for forestry

mod.name: Dartcraft
mod.description: Many new items and tools with teh power of FORCE

mod.name: Dartpatch
mod.description: Fix for MFR and Dartcraft

mod.name: Diamond Meter
mod.description: Better Furnaces that can cook better

mod.name: Dimensional Anchor
mod.description: Immibis' Chunk loaders

mod.name: Emasher Resource
mod.description: Resources for Toolbox

mod.name: Energy Manipulator
mod.description: EE2 Replacement

mod.name: Enchanting Plus
mod.description: Better Enchanting for your tools

mod.name: Ender IO
mod.description: compact liquid conduits, energy conduits and redstone conduits, power generation, machinery, remote area access (enderIO), transceivers and more

mod.name: Ender IO
mod.description: compact liquid conduits, energy conduits and redstone conduits, power generation, machinery, remote area access (enderIO), transceivers and more

mod.name: Enderstorage
mod.description: New ways to storage things over many worlds

mod.name: Engineers Toolbox
mod.description: New tech stuff all around

mod.name: ExtrabiomesXL
mod.description: New biomes

mod.name: Extra Cells
mod.description: 4 new StorageCells, many useful Blocks and a whole new Fluid System into Applied Energistics!

mod.name: Extra Utilities
mod.description: Silly and useful blocks and machines

mod.name: Factorization
mod.description: adds many machines for processing ore and crafting

mod.name: Forestry
mod.description: Trees and Bees and Butterflies and machines..

mod.name: Forge Ore Dictionary Converter
mod.description: A new way to convert all types of the same ore into the one type from one mods.

mod.name: Forge MultiPart
mod.description: New half sized blocks, like the old redpower microblocks

mod.name: Galacticraft
mod.description: Lets go to the MOON!!!

mod.name: Gate Copy
mod.description: More gates for buildcraft

mod.name: Gravity Gun
mod.description: Become Gordon Freeman!

mod.name: Greg's Lighting
mod.description: Flood the world with light.

mod.name: Hats
mod.description: Adds a bunch of hats, as wells as the ability to add more, into Minecraft

mod.name: IC2 Nuclear Control
mod.description: Control your Reactors, and keep it safe. Avoid meltdowns and unnecessary destruction!

mod.name: IC2 Recipe Fixer
mod.description: Fixes the recipes present in the last version of IC2 for 1.6.4.

mod.name: ICBM
mod.description: Machines for ICBM.

mod.name: Immibis Core
mod.description: Required for Immibis' mods.

mod.name: Immibis Peripherals
mod.description: Interact with ComputerCraft.

mod.name: IC2
mod.description: Industrialise the world with power generation, machines and automation. Or, take it over with nukes!

mod.name: Infinitubes
mod.description: Transfer items instantly with tubes, and stuff!

mod.name: Ingame Info
mod.description: Useful game info.

mod.name: Inventory Tweaks
mod.description: Quickly organise your inventory.

mod.name: Iron Chests
mod.description: Bigger, better chests.

mod.name: JABBA
mod.description: Just Another Better Barrel Attempt. Attempts to make barrels better.

mod.name: JAMI
mod.description: Lots of mod integration!

mod.name: Light Bridges
mod.description: Turn bridges on and off. Made of light, too!

mod.name: Liquid XP
mod.description: Store XP as a liquid and use it in many different ways.

mod.name: Logistics Pipes
mod.description: Logical Pipes for logical networks!

mod.name: Lucky Blocks
mod.description: The Lucky Block mod adds just one block, yet over one hundred possibilities to Minecraft!

mod.name: MFFS
mod.description: Protect your base with forcefields!

mod.name: Mekanism
mod.description: New machines and tools for UE

mod.name: Minechem
mod.description: Chemically synthesize your materials. It's almost magic. But not quite.

mod.name: MineFactory Reloaded
mod.description: Automate ALL the things!

mod.name: Gravisuite
mod.description: Defy gravity with your 'Screw you gravity-atron 3000'!

mod.name: MMMPS
mod.description: Make the coolest armour in the galaxy!

mod.name: More Swords
mod.description: Hack and slash to victory.

mod.name: Morph
mod.description: Morph into anything. Scare you friends with creeper suits!

mod.name: Mystcraft
mod.description: Create new dimensions by writing books. Who knew literature was so powerful?

mod.name: Mystcraft NEI Plugin
mod.description: Shows mystcraft pages in NEI?

mod.name: Natura
mod.description: Make the world nice and natural. Not too busy, either.

mod.name: NEI Addons
mod.description: Plugins for NEI to make recipes appear and allow custom recipe browsing.

mod.name: NEI Plugins
mod.description: Plugins for NEI to make recipes appear and allow custom recipe browsing.

mod.name: Nether Ores
mod.description: Ores in the nether! Beware of explosions.

mod.name: NEI
mod.description: Inventory editor, recipe lookup, world settings and more!

mod.name: Obsidiplates
mod.description: Did I just step on a pressure plate? Boom!

mod.name: Open Blocks
mod.description: A variety of cool blocks! Useful and practical.

mod.name: Open Peripheral
mod.description: A variety of computercraft peripherals to interact with other mod's blocks!

mod.name: Open Peripheral Addon
mod.description: A variety of computercraft peripherals to interact with other mod's blocks!

mod.name: Open Mod Lib
mod.description: Core for open blocks

mod.name: Pet Bat
mod.description: Have a pet bat follow you aorund. He will do your bidding.

mod.name: Plugins For Forestry
mod.description: Allows other mods to integrate with forestry.

mod.name: Portal Gun
mod.description: Break physics just one more time.

mod.name: Power Converters
mod.description: EU becomes MJ, MJ becomes EU. More options available!

mod.name: Project Red
mod.description: Redpower 2 remake! ForgeMultiPart compatible!

mod.name: qCraft
mod.description: qCraft is a mod that brings the principles of quantum physics to the world of Minecraft.

mod.name: Quarry Plus
mod.description: Harder, better, faster, stonger quarries.

mod.name: Railcraft
mod.description: Redefine your rails. Adds a metric boat-load of new tracks and rails to the game.

mod.name: RC Dusts
mod.description: It's a Railcraft addon that adds metal dusts and ore processing recipes to the Rock Crusher without having IC2 as a dependency, fixes and rebalances the recipes with IC2 and/or GregTech present

mod.name: Random Things
mod.description: Adds a bunch of random things, as the name suggests. As random as they may be, they're helpful!

mod.name: Redstone Arsenal
mod.description: Extension to CoFH Core with the good old omniwrench!

mod.name: Redstone in Motion
mod.description: A replacement for red power Frames

mod.name: RemoteIO
mod.description: Time to think outside the box

mod.name: Secret Rooms
mod.description: Hide stuff behind a camoflaged door. Shhhh, secret!

mod.name: Soul Shards 2
mod.description: Soul Shards 2!

mod.name: Steves Carts
mod.description: Customise a minecart to automate everything!

mod.name: Super Crafting Frame
mod.description: Auto Crafting tables that go on the wall.....

mod.name: Sync
mod.description: This mod provides clones, or as we like to call it, shells. These shells are basically a new individual, with their own inventory, experience level, and even gamemode.

mod.name: TConstruct
mod.description: Customise tools like you've never been able to before!

mod.name: Thermal Expansion
mod.description: Expand thermally. Or something along those lines...

mod.name: TMech
mod.description: Customise tools like you've never been able to before!

mod.name: TF2 Dispenser
mod.description: Repair items, heal players and be a top notch team player!

mod.name: TF2 Sentry
mod.description: Sentry comin' right up!

mod.name: TF2 Teleporter
mod.description: From point A to point B. But not C though, you haven't got A and B yet.

mod.name: Translocators
mod.description: Inventory editor, recipe lookup, world settings and more!

mod.name: Tubes
mod.description: Redpower style Tubes!

mod.name: Tubestuff
mod.description: Stuff for tubes, pipes and transport.

mod.name: UE Core
mod.description: Adds functionality to UE mods.

mod.name: Useful DNS
mod.description: Adds more functionality to DNS.

mod.name: WAILA
mod.description: What Am I Looking At? Find out! Works on blocks and mobs.

mod.name: WR-CBE
mod.description: Wireless Redstone. Need I say more?

mod.name: Zan's Minimap
mod.description: A minimap. I'm always lost without it...

mod.name: Minecraft Forge
mod.description: This allows all the other mods to be able to run

mod.name: autoutils
mod.description: Utility for chisel mod

mod.name: bspkrs Core
mod.description: used for all of bspkrs' mods

mod.name: Aroma Core
mod.description: Lib used for aroma's mods

mod.name: Calclavia Core
mod.description: Adds functionality to UE mods.

mod.name: CoFH Core
mod.description: Used for Thermal Expansion, and does its own things.

mod.name: CodeChickenCore
mod.description: Needed to run NEI and other mods made by ChickenBones

mod.name: DenLib
mod.description: Lib used for all denoflions' mods

mod.name: Held Core
mod.description: Required for Mystcraft NEI Plugin

mod.name: iChun Util
mod.description: Required for iChun's mods to work.

mod.name: Power Crystals Core
mod.description: Required for MFR and Nether Ores!

mod.name: Scala Lib
mod.description: Lib used by some mods, not playable

mod.name: Slick Untility
mod.description: Lib used by Powersuites, not playable

mod.name: CodeChickenLib
mod.description: Resource for ForgeMultipart

mod.name: Update Checker
mod.description: Checks for updates.

mod.name: Numina
mod.description: Needed for Modular Powersuits!

mod.name: DNSTechv6.0
mod.description: Small resource pack for DNS

mod.name: DNS Capes
mod.description: DNS Capes!

mod.name: ejml
mod.description: Resource lib used by Ic2

mod.name: Voxel Configs
mod.description: Voxel Map configs

mod.name: Mobius Core
mod.description: Core mod for helping optimization

mod.name: Optifine Ultra
mod.description: This *can* improve your FPS by over 200%!

mod.name: Optifine Standard
mod.description: This *can* improve your FPS by over 200%!

mod.name: Twitch IRC
mod.file: TwitchTV IRC Mod Reborn v1.1 For Minecraft 1.6.2 - 1.6.4.zip
mod.description: Connect to twitch chat in game!

mod.name: GregTech
mod.description: Easy configs - Adds 4 metric truckloads of new things!

mod.name: Magic Bees
mod.description: Adds more bees and hives. Produce your magic items at an un-bee-lievable rate.

mod.name: Meteors Mod
mod.description: Meteors Fall to the ground and explode

mod.name: Open Computers
mod.description: This mod adds programmable computers to the game. If you're thinking ComputerCraft you're not wrong, but it'd be best to toss out any assumptions you bring along with that, since the actual design and gameplay is quite different.

mod.name: Twilight Forest
mod.description: Adds a new dimension to the world. Full of interesting adventures and 'technology'!

mod.name: TrainCraft
mod.description: Adds big 3D trains and stuff.

mod.name: Evoc
mod.description: Evoc ( Extreme Vanilla Optimizations Collection ) is a new core mod aimed at providing server side optimizations for slow Vanilla TEs.

mod.name: Thaumic Tinkerer
mod.description: More Magiiiiccccc!

mod.name: Thaumcraft Extras
mod.description: Even more magiiiiccccc!

mod.name: TG4 x6 Map
mod.description: This is a challenge map based on most of the mods in the DNS Techpack
